The Dream Chapter

Graduation Song Demo | For jazz band | 2021


Program Note


This piece is a graduation song demo created for National Chung Hsing University in 2021. I worked as both the arranger and lyricist, adapting the composition for jazz band instrumentation and tailoring the lyrics to reflect students’ collective memories and future aspirations.


YU CHIA KUO · The Dream Chapter (Inst.)
